text: ovunge pitupæma numba veta darunu vuye nam evita obata hækiyava tibe nam mahapolovehi umagak soya ho ahasa mata inimagak taba næga yamen ho ovun veta oba sadhakayak rægena pæminiyada (ovun pitupaminma sititi.) tavada allah abhimata kale nam yahamanga mata ovun va ræs karannata tibuni. ebævin numba agnanayin aturin novanu
